Class Game

java.lang.Object

public class Game extends Object

    • incGameBank

      public void incGameBank(int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount)
      increments game bank by the amount specified by each parameter for each of their corresponding gem types.
      Parameters:
      rubyAmount - amount to increase ruby stack by.
      emeraldAmount - amount to increase emerald stack by.
      sapphireAmount - amount to increase sapphire stack by.
      diamondAmount - amount to increase diamond stack by.
      onyxAmount - amount to increase onyx stack by.
      goldAmount - amount to increase gold stack by.

    • incGameBankFromPlayer

      public void incGameBankFromPlayer(Player player, int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount)
      Increase game bank and decrease player bank by specified amount. (works the opposite for negative number)
      Parameters:
      player - player whose funds will get decreased.
      rubyAmount - amount to increase ruby stack by.
      emeraldAmount - amount to increase emerald stack by.
      sapphireAmount - amount to increase sapphire stack by.
      diamondAmount - amount to increase diamond stack by.
      onyxAmount - amount to increase onyx stack by.
      goldAmount - amount to increase gold stack by.

    • gameBankHasAtLeast

      public boolean gameBankHasAtLeast(int rubyAmount, int emeraldAmount, int sapphireAmount, int diamondAmount, int onyxAmount, int goldAmount)
      Checks if game bank has at least x amount of each gem type.
      Parameters:
      rubyAmount - minimum amount or rubies player should have
      emeraldAmount - minimum amount or emerald player should have
      sapphireAmount - minimum amount or sapphire player should have
      diamondAmount - minimum amount or diamond player should have
      onyxAmount - minimum amount or onyx player should have
      goldAmount - minimum amount or gold player should have
      Returns:
      true if bank has at least input amounts of each gem type, false otherwise.

      public PurchaseMap gameBankToPurchaseMap()
      Game bank to purchase map.
      Returns:
      the purchase map
